attributes.action: Make the tax man get it right
attributes.additional_details:
The tax man has been sending letters and refunds out to unsuspecting victims.
Days or hours after getting a tax refund or demand, another letter arrives with a demand forthe refund  money back OR MORE money than the 1st letter which exceeds the tax refund.
This is very distressing especially when a pensioner gets so many letters in as many months;
We demand that the tax man gets it right first time.
 For all pensioners. They have paid tax all there lives its wrong to tax them further on the measly pension they get from the DSS
